pullrequest.title: List pull requests by creation date

content.raw:
Assigning people to review pull-requests doesn't capture conflicts between pull-requests. 

What we want to avoid are two pull-requests that modify the same code. We also don't want pull-requests to linger in the queue for too long.

There is currently no mechanism to look at older pull-requests first.

I was considering something more drastic. Along the lines of only 5 active pull-requests are allowed.

Assigning people to review pull-requests doesn't capture conflicts between pull-requests.

What we want to avoid are two pull-requests that modify the same code. We also don't want pull-requests to linger in the queue for too long.

There is currently no mechanism to look at older pull-requests first.

I was considering something more drastic. Along the lines of only 5 active pull-requests are allowed.
